[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@tridion-sites/extensions](./extensions.md) &gt; [useOptionalBundleEditor](./extensions.useoptionalbundleeditor.md)

## useOptionalBundleEditor variable

Provides access to Bundle Editor data and methods, if available. `undefined` is returned when used outside of Bundle Editor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
useOptionalBundleEditor: OptionalBundleEditorHook;
```
